## cilium node neigh insert

Insert node as a neighbor into current node's neighbor table

### Synopsis

Insert node as a neighbor into current node's neighbor table

```
cilium node neigh insert <neigh name> <neigh IP> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
cilium node neigh insert "node1" 192.0.2.1
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for insert
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```
